projects: [{"title":"Quality Assessment of Wikipedia Articles | Computer Science Dept. | IIT Kharagpur","start_date":"Nov 2018","end_date":"Mar 2019","description":"Received Letter of Recommendation from Professor Animesh Mukherjee for excellent research work- Performed extensive feature engineering by combining attributes from metadata & the content at each revision of Wikipedia page- Improved quality prediction over standard Wikimedia API (ORES) by implementing LSTMs to obtain an accuracy of around 65%"},{"title":"Neural Word Segmenter for Sanskrit | Computer Science Dept. | IIT Kharagpur","start_date":"Aug 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Received Letter of Recommendation from Professor Pawan Goyal for contribution to the project.‚Ä¢ Predicted the \"Unsandhied\" string from the \"Sandhied\" Sanskrit input as a structured prediction problem using a deep seq2seq model‚Ä¢ Improved the segmentation task by using CopyNet, an encoder-decoder structure using a novel copying & prediction mechanism"},{"title":"OCR Module for Handwriting recognition","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Jun 2018","description":"-Achieved 98 percent accuracy for the classiÔ¨Åcation of handwritten alphabets and numerals by using deep learning techniques such as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) on EMNIST data set available on the internet."},{"title":"Path Planning and localization in 2D plane","start_date":"Jan 2018","end_date":"Feb 2018","description":"-Implemented path planning using RRT, RRT connect and Dijkstra on a 2-dimensional obstacle map along with using Kalman Filters for problem of localization"}]

honors_and_awards.description: General Championship is a nail biting competition amongst all the halls of residence (hostels) at IIT Kharagpur - Developed Data led models to help curb network congestion given cell tower statistics. - Recall - 80%; Classifiers used - SVM, Logistic, Random Forest.
